titles.title: Halting Uncertain Methods and Practices in Supervision Act of 2025
HUMPS Act of 2025
Halting Uncertain Methods and Practices in Supervision Act of 2025
HUMPS Act of 2025
HUMPS Act of 2025

To amend the Federal Financial Institutions Examination Council Act of 1978 to require the Federal financial institutions regulatory agencies to update the CAMELS Rating System, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held
Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by the Yeas and Nays: 29 - 23.
Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Financial Services. H. Rept. 119-170.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 136.

committee.name: House Financial Services
committee.activity: Reported By, Markup By, Referred To
